Name: Evil Hazard
About the game: Evil Hazard is a pixel style action-platformer game.The world is full of dangerous creatures that would endanger human beings.You are the hero to rescue us. Key features: Challenging handmade Levels Epic boss fights Interchangeable weapons and equipment Tons of weapons,equipment,items to collect Can upgrade hero and equipment Difficulty: Hard,die easily
